Name: Blue Hawaiian
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
30 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice.
History: Probably created by Don the Beachcomber in Los Angeles, USA, this is a riff on the Blue Hawaii .
Nutrition: One serving of Blue Hawaiian contains 269 calories
